p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. p_361: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
